description:
A VPN for Windows will improve your security while you’re connected to the internet on your PC. Enjoy more secure streaming, browsing, and work with NordVPN.

NordVPN encrypts your internet traffic and hides your IP and physical location. Works on 6 devices at once, on every major platform. With NordVPN, encrypt your online activity to protect your private data from hackers or snoopy advertisers. Enjoy global connectivity along with high-performance speed and secure access to streaming websites, censored content and social networks.
* New: You asked – we heard! You can now choose where your files land when using Meshnet's file transfer. Pick your preferred downloads folder for easier access.
* Our NordLynx protocol, which powers Meshnet, just got a speed boost! For those curious about the magic – we switched it from WireGuard in Go to WireGuardNT.
* Kill Switch will cut the traffic from your apps even when the VPN is just paused. Because "paused" sounds way too much like "potential risk."
* We've revamped the feature names and categories in Threat Protection Pro™, making it cleaner, simpler, and easier to navigate.
